Setting Merge Options in Visual Diff

When you merge the files you are comparing in Visual Diff, you can also edit them.

To set merge options:

  1. In Visual Diff, select Edit > Options from the menu. The Options dialog opens.

  2. Click the Merge tab.

  3. To display the merged file in an editor, select the Edit merged file check box.

  4. To select the editor of your choice (Notepad is the default), enter or browse for the path to the editor.

  5. Click OK.
